Last update date: August 18, 2019

Data we collect

We didn't collect any data.

Everything is yours and stored in your browser. Some data is cached locally, to improve performances.

We don't have any access to that data

Tiers data collected

We use Google Analytics to analyse -anonymously- the user behavior.
This data helps us building a better extension, and is available as an opt-out in the application settings

We synchronize the user settings through a Google Chrome API that is not accessible outside the application.

Every data from your Google account is managed and stored by Google

Every data from the weather widget is managed and stored by Open Weather Map

Every data from your browser and your computer is managed and stored by Google Chrome
